title: MESMERIC INDUCTION / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
In this video Dr. Marco Paret will demonstrate you a non-verbal technique for mesmeric induction. Mesmerism is a practice that uses non verbal communication to promote a particular trance state. Some people say that you “shift” the energy field within a client and it has a strong therapeutic effect. Some other view the reason for the results in physiological responses. In any case there results that are not achievable with other methods. Learn all these powerful techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis school.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
